body:
I'm actually having the same problem. On my home computer it works as it should, but at work the GenCumulativeSkyMtx component doesn't seem to do what it is supposed to. The *.mtx files it generates are 0kb. I've tried regenning the files several times, and changed the workingDir_ as well, but it still makes empty files. I assume it is something to do with how my work computer is set up, but I cannot make sense of how to fix it.



Any ideas?
